# Feature Request

## Problem statement

What problem are you trying to solve?

## Proposed API

Show the expected options and return shape.

```ts
// Example
// useYourHook(options): { ... }
```

## Why current hooks are not enough

Explain what is missing with current APIs.

## Use case

Describe a real-world scenario (dashboard, media, auth/session, etc.).

## Alternatives considered

List other approaches you considered.

## Additional context

Any links, mockups, or references.
